answers.answer: omg i feel the exact same way and i'm 7w1d i can easy everything and still feel hungry lol but i don't think it'll change until our bundles of joy are born :) congrats to you, when are you due?
Im due november 18th. This is my first and im very excited! And congrats to you to! Whens your due date?

I hate the feeling sometimes because it sometimes makes me feel bloated depending on what I have eaten. I try an break my meals down like we are suppose to 6 mini meals plus 3 snacks but some days ill just snack on what ever it I seem to b craving if its n my casa.
i'm due November 14th :) so we're not that far apart :)
I felt the same way the first 12 weeks in time it'll get better.I still feel hungry all the time & those 6 small meals don't cut it. I try to graze on healthy snacks even though its hard.

You should just try to eat small snacks during the day even some fruit crackers anything healthy! Your blood sugar is probably low thats why you feel shaky..so just try to keep a snack with you at all times!

Yeah were only four days apart! Lol thats awesome!! What all symptoms are you having? And I try to eat small snacks but it never works cuz im hungry like.twenty minutes later. But ive learned to not eat until im totally full, did that once and I felr like I was gonna blow up and felt sooooo sick it was awful.

If you wake up at night be sure to eat something light that has protein and some sugars, like a peanut butter sandwich and a glass of milk or some ice cream or fruits or SOMETHING. Drink lots of water and make sure you keep your blood sugars up, you might have pregnancy diabetes (I forget the technical name).

question: Ok so I wake up every morning feeling like I am starving, nauseous, shakey and dizzy headed. I feel like im starvimg all day lomg, even after I eat. And the docror says I need to ne eating six small meals a day and I try to but nothing sounds good to eat and always makes me feel sick to eat. I am taking my daily prenatal vitamins so I know im getting the vitamins im needing but still feel this way every day. Any help??
title: 6 weeks pregnant, weird symptoms? shaky and starving!
